directions: [["In a large bowl, whisk together the turmeric, cayenne, salt, and oil. Add paneer cubes and gently toss."],["Thaw the spinach in the microwave then puree in a food processor until smooth."],["Fry paneer in a nonstick skillet over medium heat until slightly brown. Remove paneer from pan onto a plate."],["Add onions, ginger, garlic, and chile to pan. Add extra oil if needed and saute the mixture until it's evenly toffee-colored, which should take about 15 minutes. If mixture is drying out and burning, add water."],["Add the garam masala, coriander, and cumin. Sprinkle a little water to keep the spices from burning. Cook, stirring often, until the raw scent of spices cooks out, 3-5 minutes."],["Add the spinach and stir well, incorporating the spiced onion mixture into the spinach. Add salt as desired and up to 1/2 cup of water. Stir and cook about 5 minutes with the lid off."],["Turn the heat off. Add the yogurt a little at a time to keep it from curdling. Once the yogurt is well mixed into the spinach, add the paneer."],["Turn the heat back on, cover and cook until everything is warmed through, about 5 minutes."]]
ingredients: [{"number":["1"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["turmeric"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1/2"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["cayenne"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["kosher salt"],"category":[""]},{"number":["3"],"units":["Tablespoon(s)"],"name":["oil"],"category":[""]},{"number":["12"],"units":["Ounce(s)"],"name":["paneer, cut into 1-inch cubes"],"category":[""]},{"number":["16"],"units":["Ounce(s)"],"name":["frozen chopped spinach"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["Onion, finely chopped"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Tablespoon(s)"],"name":["Ginger, peeled and minced"],"category":[""]},{"number":["4"],"units":["Clove(s)"],"name":["Garlic, minced"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["Serrano chile, finely chopped"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1/2"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Garam masala"],"category":[""]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Ground coriander"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Ground cumin"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1/2"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Plain yogurt"],"category":[""]}]
